modName: Forceful Bash patch for SkyRe and balanced version
summary: Just a small compatibility patch of Forceful Bash mod by borjoyzee for Skyrim Redone by T3nd0 and optional balanced versions.
descriptionHtml:
First of all english is not my native language so I apologize for my bad english.

This is just a simple patch for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30697/?]Forceful Bash[/url] to make it work with SkyRe.

This is my first file uploaded, I made this a while ago and decided to share it to others. Many people asked if Forceful Bash was compatible with Skyre and sadly it wasnt ,searched in nexus and no one have done it or uploaded it and then I decided and tried to make it compatible by myself using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49373/?]Automation Tools for TES5Edit[/url] and I made it, it was easier than i tought ,so download it and enjoy!.

I also added optional files to make Forceful Bash less overpowered, you will trigger Forceful Bash only every 5,10 or 20 seconds(each enemy has his own cooldown), you dont need Forceful Bash Skyre to use this but you still need original mod.
(USE ONLY ONE BALANCED VERSION)

There is also an All in One version, this one doesn't requiere original mod nor FB skyre patch, you only need SkyRe.

[u]Requirements[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?]Skyrim Redone by T3nd0[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48629/?]Skyrim Redone Unnoficial Patch by xathra and ExImIeR[/url](Im still not sure If you need this but its a Skyre update so Its a must have!, and I've done the patch from this)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30697/?]Forceful Bash by borjoyzee[/url](Only if not using All in One version)

[u]Installation[/u]
1.Drag and drop ForcefulBashPerk_Skyre.esp in Data folder
2.Load ForcefulBashPerk.esp after SkyRe_Main.esp.
3.Load this patch after ForcefulBashPerk.esp
4.(Optional)Choose ONLY ONE balanced version,drag and drop it in Data folder and load it after ForcefulBashPerk.esp or ForcefulBashPerk_Skyre.esp if you use it.
5.Thats it.

OR

1.Pick All in One Version.
2.Load it after SkyRe_Main.esp
3.Done.

And please useÂ [url=http://loot.github.io/]LOOT[/url].

[u]Compatibilities/Incompatibilities[/u]
Anything that is not compatible with original Forceful Bash mod or any other mod that change/modify Block Perk Tree will be incompatible with this.
Should be compatible with any optional file from Forceful Bash mod.

[u]Uninstallation[/u]
Remove the esp.

[u]Recommended Mods[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50225/?]Kick Blocked[/url](Kick animation while blocking instead of a bash)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44666/?]Kick Bash[/url](more kicks)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17491/?]D13 Faster GET UP STAND UP animation vanilla friendly[/url](to make forceful bash less overpowered)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59014/?]Weapon Blocking Punch[/url] (Punch instead of bash)

[u]Credits[/u]
Bethesda - For making an awesome game!
T3nd0 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?]Skyrim Redone[/url]
xathra and ExlmleR - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48629/?]Skyrim Redone Unnoficial Patch[/url]
borjoyzee - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30697/?]Forceful Bash[/url](thanks for giving permission to make this patch :))

Please report any issue or problem please or just tell me if its working :)
author: Rudi91

files.name: All in One esp - Forceful bash plus skyre patch plus balanced version(10s)

files.changelogHtml: Changed Forceful Bash perk position to the left instead of right.
